H0.text: Which country joined the G7 government forum which then became the G8 in 1997. China

H1.text: Which country joined the G7 government forum which then became the G8 in 1997. India

H2.text: Which country joined the G7 government forum which then became the G8 in 1997. Brazil

H3.text: Which country joined the G7 government forum which then became the G8 in 1997. Рәсәй

A4.text: 1997: Russia joins the G8 at the 23rd G8 summit in Denver, Colorado, on June 20 to 22.
